python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, 'src'); from operations.healthcheck_operation import HealthCheckOperation; result = HealthCheckOperation().execute(); print('‚úÖ CORTEX Health Status'); print('=' * 50); print('Overall Status:', result.data['overall_status'].upper()); print('Warnings:', len(result.data.get('warnings', []))); print('Errors:', len(result.data.get('errors', []))); print(); print('System Checks:'); for check, data in result.data['checks'].items(): print(f'  {check}: {data.get(\"status\", \"unknown\").upper()}'); print(); if result.data.get('warnings'): print('‚ö†Ô∏è  Warnings:'); for w in result.data['warnings'][:3]: print(f'  - {w}')"
